name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 8 years of experience, I am skilled in leveraging modern web technologies to design and implement high-performance applications. Proficient in **SvelteKit**, **ElysiaJS**, and **SurrealDB**, I excel at creating efficient, scalable solutions tailored to client needs. My background includes using Python with frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**, as well as expertise in cloud platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**. I also bring a comprehensive understanding of frontend frameworks including **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, and **Next.js**. My experience in microservices architecture and API development (REST/gRPC) ensures that I deliver reliable and secure applications. I am committed to optimizing database performance using **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**, consistently aligning solutions with industry best practices.
